units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S4U04 — Material properties & uses
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Chemical Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S3U02 — Soils, rocks, minerals (properties & resources)
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Earth & Space Sciences, so this Y3 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Physical Sciences — AC9S3U03 — Heat sources & temperature change
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Physical Sciences, so this Y3 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Surveying Technician
careers.whyThis: Surveying Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Surveying Technician you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. Surveying Technician is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Surveying Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Waste Management Technician
careers.whyThis: Waste Management Technician will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Waste Management Technician you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. Waste Management Technician is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Waste Management Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Genetics Lab Assistant
careers.whyThis: Genetics Lab Assistant will help you build your Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Genetics Lab Assistant you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. Genetics Lab Assistant is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Genetics Lab Assistant now and understand what to work towards.
